search_pattern.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { ?s <https://schema.org/genre> ?entity . ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel }

PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ; sdo:genre ?entity. ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel}
SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q188451 . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }}

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE { ?subject mo:genre ?entity . ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .}

artists.query: PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ; sdo:genre ?starting_value;  (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/ (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?entity . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel . } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:genre ?starting_value;   (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/ (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?entity  . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel .} BIND("is associated with" as ?rel)}

SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?entity wdt:P136 ?starting_value . ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q105756498 BIND(str("has genre") AS ?inverse_rel) }. SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } }

PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entitylabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {}  ?x mo:genre ?starting_value .  ?x (dbo:writer | mo:composer | mo:performance_of/(dbo:writer | mo:composer)) ?entity .  ?entity rdfs:label ?entitylabel .  BIND("explored by" AS ?rel) . } ORDER BY ?entitylabel

places.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ; sdo:genre ?starting_value ; sdo:locationCreated ?location . ?location sdo:sameAs ?entity . ?location sdo:name ?entityLabel . } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:genre ?starting_value; sdo:locationCreated ?location . ?location sdo:sameAs ?entity . ?location sdo:name ?entityLabel .} BIND("is associated with" as ?rel)}

SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?starting_value wdt:P495 ?entity. BIND(str("has country of origin") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?starting_value wdt:P740 ?entity. BIND(str("has location of formation") AS ?rel) }. SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

genres.query: PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ;  sdo:genre ?starting_value ; sdo:genre ?entity. ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel . } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:genre ?starting_value ; sdo:genre ?entity. ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel .} FILTER(?entity != ?starting_value) BIND("is associated with" as ?rel)}

SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?starting_value wdt:P279 ?entity. BIND(str("subclass of") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?entity wdt:P737 ?starting_value. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q188451 . BIND(str("influenced by") AS ?inverse_rel) } . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

creative works.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?starting_value ^<https://schema.org/genre> ?entity. ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel BIND(str("has subject") AS ?inverse_rel) } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

instruments.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {<http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/gtaa/234346>}{ ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ; sdo:genre ?starting_value ; sdo:byArtist/sdo:roleName ?entity . ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel . ?entity a <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q34379> .  } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:genre ?starting_value; sdo:byArtist/sdo:roleName ?entity . ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel . ?entity a <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q34379> .} BIND("is associated with" as ?rel)}

section.title: Explore music genres
section.description: Jazz, Classical, Rock, Hip-Hop, Pop and more to discover

search_pattern.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { ?s <https://schema.org/character> ?entity . ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel } ORDER BY ?entity

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX mtp: <http://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/meetups-ontology#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { ?s mtp:hasSubject ?entity. ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel. }

PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ;  (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/ (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?entity . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel . } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/(sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?entity . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel .} }

SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {{ ?entity wdt:P106 wd:Q36834 . } UNION { ?entity wdt:P106 wd:Q639669 . } UNION { ?entity wdt:P106 wd:Q753110 . } UNION { ?entity wdt:P106 wd:Q177220 . } UNION { ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q215380 . } SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }} LIMIT 20000

PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX led: <http://led.kmi.open.ac.uk/term/> PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX pl: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE {?x (dbo:agent | mo:performer | dbo:writer | mo:composer | dbo:author) ?entity .?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .}

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { ?entity rdf:type <http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/amr/Person> ; <http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/amr/name> ?entityLabel . }

artists.query: PREFIX mtp: <http://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/meetups-ontology#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?subject {} ?s mtp:hasSubject ?subject ; mtp:hasParticipant ?participant ; mtp:hasType ?type . FILTER (regex ( str (?type), str ("HM") ) ) . ?participant mtp:hasEntity ?entityURI . ?entityURI rdfs:label ?entityLabel . BIND(str("interacted with") AS ?rel) . BIND(?entityURI AS ?entity) . } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?starting_value wdt:P25 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . BIND(str("has mother") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?starting_value wdt:P22 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . BIND(str("has father") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?starting_value wdt:P40 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . BIND(str("has child") AS ?rel) } UNION {?starting_value wdt:P802 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . BIND(str("has student") AS ?rel)} UNION {?starting_value ^wdt:P802 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . BIND(str("has student") AS ?inverse_rel)} UNION {?starting_value wdt:P737/wdt:P737/wdt:P737 ?entity. BIND(str("influenced by") AS ?rel)} UNION {?starting_value ^wdt:P737 ?entity. BIND(str("influenced by") AS ?inverse_rel)}. SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX led: <http://led.kmi.open.ac.uk/term/> PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX pl: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entitylabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?x mo:listener ?starting_value .  ?x (dbo:agent | mo:performer | dbo:writer | mo:composer |dbo:author) ?entity .  ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .   BIND("a listener of" AS ?rel) .} ORDER BY ?entityLabel

places.query: PREFIX mtp: <http://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/meetups-ontology#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?subject {} ?s mtp:hasSubject ?subject ; mtp:hasPlace ?aPlaceURI ; mtp:hasType ?type . FILTER (regex ( str (?type), str ("HM") ) ) . ?aPlaceURI mtp:hasEntity ?entityURI . ?entityURI rdfs:label ?entityLabel . BIND(str("connected to") AS ?rel) . BIND(?entityURI AS ?entity) . } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/gtaa/124434> ;  (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/ (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?starting_value ; sdo:locationCreated ?blank_node.  ?blank_node sdo:sameAs ?entity .  ?blank_node sdo:name ?entityLabel } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/ (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?starting_value ; sdo:locationCreated ?blank_node  . ?blank_node sdo:sameAs ?entity . ?blank_node sdo:name ?entityLabel} BIND("is associated with" as ?rel)} ORDER BY ?entityLabe

SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?starting_value wdt:P19 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q702492 . BIND(str("has place of birth") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?starting_value wdt:P20 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q702492 . BIND(str("has place of death") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?starting_value wdt:P937 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q702492 . BIND(str("has work location") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?starting_value wdt:P740 ?entity. BIND(str("location of formation") AS ?rel)} UNION { ?starting_value wdt:P495 ?entity. BIND(str("has country of origin") AS ?rel)} . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX bibo: <http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/> PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/> PREFIX event: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {}  {    ?starting_value schema:birthPlace ?entity .    ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .    BIND("birthPlace" AS ?rel)  }  UNION  {    ?starting_value schema:deathPlace ?entity .    ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .    BIND("deathPlace" AS ?rel)  }} ORDER BY ?entityLabel

creative works.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?starting_value ^<https://schema.org/character> ?entity. ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel BIND(str("has subject") AS ?inverse_rel) } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

genres.query: PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ;  (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/ (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?starting_value ;sdo:genre ?entity.  ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel . } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/ (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?starting_value  ;sdo:genre ?entity. ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel .} BIND("is associated with" as ?rel)}

SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?starting_value wdt:P136 ?entity. BIND(str("has genre") AS ?rel) } SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX led: <http://led.kmi.open.ac.uk/term/> PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX pl: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entitylabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {}  ?x mo:genre ?entity .  ?x (dbo:writer | mo:composer | mo:performance_of/(dbo:writer | mo:composer)) ?starting_value .  ?entity rdfs:label ?entitylabel .  BIND("works with genre" AS ?rel) . } ORDER BY ?entitylabel

topics.query: PREFIX mtp: <http://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/meetups-ontology#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/meetups> WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?s mtp:hasSubject ?starting_value ; mtp:hasParticipant ?participant . FILTER  (!regex (str(?participant), str(?starting_value) ) ) . ?s mtp:hasAPurpose ?purpose . ?purpose rdfs:label ?entityLabel . BIND(str("has meetup type") AS ?rel) . BIND(?purpose AS ?entity) } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

instruments.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ; sdo:byArtist ?artistInRole . ?artistInRole sdo:byArtist ?starting_value .?artistInRole sdo:roleName ?entity . ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel . ?entity a <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q34379> .} UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:byArtist ?artistInRole . ?artistInRole sdo:byArtist ?starting_value ; sdo:roleName ?entity . ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel ; a <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q34379> . } BIND("is associated with" as ?rel)}

PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX led: <http://led.kmi.open.ac.uk/agent/> PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX pl: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entitylabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {}  ?x mo:instrument ?entity .  ?x (led:agent | mo:performer | mo:performance_of/(led:agent | mo:performer)) ?starting_value .  ?entity rdfs:label ?entitylabel .  BIND("plays" AS ?rel) .} ORDER BY ?entitylabel

listening experience.query: PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel ?rel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?entity mo:performer ?starting_value . BIND("performed in" AS ?rel) } UNION { ?entity mo:listener ?starting_value . BIND("attended" AS ?rel)} ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .}

section.title: Engage with artists
section.description: Bands, Singers, Musicians, Composers, Conductors and beyond await

search_pattern.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q105543609 . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }} LIMIT 30000

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { ?entity rdf:type <http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/amr/Work-of-art> . ?entity <http://www.ontologydesignpatterns.org/ont/amr/name> ?entityLabel . }

artists.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?starting_value wdt:P86 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . BIND(str("has composer") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?starting_value wdt:P676 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . BIND(str("lyrics by") AS ?rel) } UNION {VALUES ?type {wd:Q215380 wd:Q5} ?starting_value wdt:P175 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 ?type . BIND(str("has performer") AS ?rel) } . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

section.title: Dive into music works
section.description: Songs, Symphonies, Jazz Compositions, Film Scores, Pop Hits, and more

search_pattern.query: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX mtp: <http://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/meetups-ontology#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { ?entity rdf:type mtp:Location ; rdfs:label ?entityLabel . }

PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .{?programUri sdo:locationCreated ?location . ?location sdo:sameAs ?entity .?location sdo:name ?entityLabel .}UNION{?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:locationCreated ?location .?location sdo:sameAs ?entity .?location sdo:name ?entityLabel.} }
SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q515 . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }}

PREFIX event: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE {  ?event event:place ?entity .   ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel . }

artists.query: PREFIX mtp: <http://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/meetups-ontology#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?subject {} ?placeMeetupIRI mtp:hasEntity ?subject . ?meetup mtp:hasPlace ?placeMeetupIRI ; mtp:hasParticipant ?meetupParticipantIRI . ?meetupParticipantIRI mtp:hasEntity ?entity . ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel . BIND(str("has meetup participant") AS ?rel) . } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ; sdo:locationCreated/sdo:sameAs ?starting_value ;  (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/ (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?entity . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel . } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:locationCreated/sdo:sameAs ?starting_value; (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/ (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?entity  . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel .} BIND("is associated with" as ?rel)} ORDER BY ?entityLabel

SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?entity wdt:P740 ?starting_value. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q105756498  BIND(str("is place of formation of") AS ?rel) }  UNION {?entity wdt:P551 ?starting_value . ?entity wdt:P106 ?occupation . ?occupation wdt:P31 wd:Q66715801 .  BIND(str("lived in") AS ?inverse_rel)}  UNION {?starting_value wdt:P483 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q746369. BIND(str("recorded in") AS ?inverse_rel)}. SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

instruments.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} {?entity wdt:P1071 ?starting_value. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q110295396 . BIND(str("created in") AS ?inverse_rel)} SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

genres.query: PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ;sdo:locationCreated/sdo:sameAs ?starting_value ;sdo:genre ?entity. ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel . } UNION {?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> . ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:locationCreated/sdo:sameAs ?starting_value  ; sdo:genre ?entity. ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel .} BIND("is associated with" as ?rel)} ORDER BY ?entityLabel

SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?musician wdt:P31 wd:Q5; ?place_rel ?starting_value; wdt:P136 ?entity.  BIND(str("artist's genre") AS ?rel) SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }}

places.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131>  ; sdo:locationCreated/sdo:sameAs ?starting_value; sdo:locationCreated ?location . ?location sdo:sameAs ?entity . ?location sdo:name ?entityLabel . } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:locationCreated/sdo:sameAs ?starting_value; sdo:locationCreated ?location . ?location sdo:sameAs ?entity . ?location sdo:name ?entityLabel .} BIND("is associated with" as ?rel)}

section.title: Discover places
section.description: Step into a world of mastery: Cities, Concert Halls, Theatres, Recording Studios and more

search_pattern.query: PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>  SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .{?programUri sdo:byArtist/sdo:roleName ?entity . ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .?entity a <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q34379> .}UNION{ ?programUri sdo:hasPart/sdo:byArtist/sdo:roleName ?entity . ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel . ?entity a <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q34379>. }}

SELECT ?entity ?entityLabel { ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q110295396 . ?entity wikibase:statements ?outcoming . ?entity wikibase:sitelinks ?sitelinks . { SELECT (count(?s) AS ?incoming) ?entity WHERE { ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q110295396 . ?s ?p ?entity . [] wikibase:directClaim ?p} GROUP BY ?entity} SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" . }.} ORDER BY DESC (?incoming)

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE {  ?subject mo:instrument ?entity .  ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel . }

SELECT DISTINCT ?entity (CONCAT(UCASE(SUBSTR(?o, 1, 1)), SUBSTR(?o, 2), " - ", ?church) AS ?entityLabel) WHERE {{ SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?church ?o WHERE {?entity rdf:type a-dd:MusicalInstrument ; a-loc:hasCulturalPropertyAddress/clvapit:hasRegion <https://w3id.org/arco/resource/Region/liguria> ; a-loc:hasTimeIndexedTypedLocation/a-loc:atSite/rdfs:label ?church ; dc:subject ?o FILTER (str(?o) = 'concerto di campane') .}} UNION {SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?church ?bellString AS ?o WHERE {?entity rdf:type a-dd:MusicalInstrument ; a-loc:hasCulturalPropertyAddress/clvapit:hasRegion <https://w3id.org/arco/resource/Region/liguria> ; a-loc:hasTimeIndexedTypedLocation/a-loc:atSite/rdfs:label ?church ; rdfs:label ?title ;dc:subject ?o FILTER (str(?o) = 'campana') . BIND (STRBEFORE(?title, " (") AS ?bellString) . FILTER (LANGMATCHES(LANG(?bellString), "it")) .}}}

artists.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ; sdo:byArtist ?artistInRole. ?artistInRole sdo:roleName ?starting_value . ?artistInRole sdo:byArtist ?entity . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel  } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:byArtist ?artistInRole . ?artistInRole sdo:roleName ?starting_value. ?artistInRole sdo:byArtist ?entity . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel  } BIND("is associated with" as ?rel)}

SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?starting_value wdt:P61 ?entity. BIND(str("invented by") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?entity wdt:P1535 ?starting_value . BIND(str("used by") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?entity wdt:P1303 ?starting_value. BIND(str("played by") AS ?rel) } . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } }

PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX led: <http://led.kmi.open.ac.uk/agent/> PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX pl: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entitylabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {}  ?x mo:instrument ?starting_value .  ?x (led:agent | mo:performer | mo:performance_of/(led:agent | mo:performer)) ?entity .  ?entity rdfs:label ?entitylabel .  BIND("played by" AS ?rel) .} ORDER BY ?entitylabel

places.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?starting_value wdt:P1343 ?entity.  BIND(str("described in") AS ?rel) } . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

builder.query: PREFIX clv: <https://w3id.org/italia/onto/CLV/> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel {VALUES ?starting_value {} .?starting_value a-cd:hasAuthor ?entity ;dc:subject ?o FILTER (str(?o) = 'campana') . ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .BIND(str("has author") AS ?rel)}

instruments.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ; sdo:byArtist ?artistInRole. ?artistInRole sdo:roleName ?starting_value . ?programUri sdo:byArtist/sdo:roleName ?entity .  ?entity a <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q34379> . ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:byArtist ?artistInRole . ?artistInRole sdo:roleName ?starting_value.   ?sceneUri sdo:byArtist/sdo:roleName ?entity .  ?entity a <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q34379> . ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel  } BIND("is associated with" as ?rel)}

SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?starting_value {} {?entity arco:isCulturalPropertyComponentOf ?starting_value ;a-loc:hasTimeIndexedTypedLocation/a-loc:atSite/rdfs:label ?church ;rdfs:label ?title ;dc:coverage ?city . BIND(STRBEFORE(?title, " (") AS ?bellString) .FILTER (LANGMATCHES(LANG(?bellString), "it")) .BIND(CONCAT(?bellString, " - ", ?church, " - ", ?city) AS ?entityLabel) .BIND(str("has component") AS ?rel)}UNION{?starting_value arco:isCulturalPropertyComponentOf ?entity .?entity rdf:type a-dd:MusicalInstrument ;dc:coverage ?city ;a-loc:hasCulturalPropertyAddress/clvapit:hasRegion <https://w3id.org/arco/resource/Region/liguria> ;a-loc:hasTimeIndexedTypedLocation/a-loc:atSite/rdfs:label ?church ; dc:subject ?subject . FILTER (str(?subject) = 'concerto di campane') .BIND(CONCAT(UCASE(SUBSTR(?subject, 1, 1)), SUBSTR(?subject, 2), " - ", ?church, " - ", ?city) AS ?entityLabel).BIND(str("is component of") AS ?rel)}UNION{?starting_value a-cd:hasAuthor ?author .?entity rdf:type a-dd:MusicalInstrument ;a-cd:hasAuthor ?author ;dc:coverage ?city ;a-loc:hasTimeIndexedTypedLocation/a-loc:atSite/rdfs:label ?church ;rdfs:label ?title ;dc:subject ?o FILTER (str(?o) = 'campana') .BIND (STRBEFORE(?title, " (") AS ?bellString) .FILTER (LANGMATCHES(LANG(?bellString), "it")) .FILTER (?entity != ?starting_value) .BIND("has same author of" AS ?rel). BIND(CONCAT(?bellString, " - ", ?church, " - ", ?city) AS ?entityLabel)}UNION{?starting_value a-loc:hasTimeIndexedTypedLocation/a-loc:atLocation ?locale .?entity rdf:type a-dd:MusicalInstrument ;a-loc:hasTimeIndexedTypedLocation/a-loc:hasLocationType a-loc:ProductionRealizationLocation ;a-loc:hasTimeIndexedTypedLocation/a-loc:atLocation ?locale ;dc:coverage ?city ;a-loc:hasTimeIndexedTypedLocation/a-loc:atSite/rdfs:label ?church ;rdfs:label ?title ;dc:subject ?subject FILTER (str(?subject) = 'campana') .BIND (STRBEFORE(?title, " (") AS ?bellString) .FILTER (LANGMATCHES(LANG(?bellString), "it")) .FILTER (?entity != ?starting_value) .BIND(str("has same place of") AS ?rel). BIND(CONCAT(?bellString, " - ", ?church, " - ", ?city) AS ?entityLabel)}} ORDER BY ?entityLabel

genres.query: PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>  PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/>  PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ;sdo:genre ?entity;sdo:byArtist/sdo:roleName ?starting_value . ?starting_value a <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q34379> . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel . } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ; sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:genre ?entity; sdo:byArtist/sdo:roleName ?starting_value .?starting_value a <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q34379> . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel .} BIND("is associated with" as ?rel)}
